div.l: My hous is streit but ȝe haue lernyd art
Ȝe can be argument make a place
A Myle brode of twenti fote of space
Let se now ȝif þis space mow suffise
Or make it rowm̉er with speche as is ȝoure gise
Now symond seide þis Iohan be seynt Cutberd
Ay is þow mery and þat is faire vnswerd
I haue herd say men shal taken of twa þynges
Swiche as ȝe fynde or take swiche as ȝe brynges
But specialy I pray þe ost dere
Gete vs some mete ⁊and drynke ⁊and make vs chere
And we wol payen trewly atte fulle
With empti hondys men may noon haukes tulle
Lo here oure silver redy for to spende
This Miller to þe town his doughter sende
For ale and brede and roosted hem a goos
And bond hir hors it shold nomore go loos
And in his owne chambre he made a bedde
With shetes and with chalons faire I sprede
Nouȝt from his owne bed ten fote or twelue
His doughter hadde al by hir selue
Right in þe same chambre by and by
It myghte be no bet and cause whi
Ther was no romer herberewe in þᵉ place
Þei soupen and þei speken hem to solace
And drynken eủere strong ale atte beste
A bout mydnyght went þei to reste
Wel hath þis myller vernysshed venysshed vernysshed his hede
Ful pale he was for dronken ⁊and nouȝt rede
He ȝexeth and he spekith þurgh þe nose
As he were on þe quakke or on þe pose
To bed he goth and wᵗith hym goth his wif
As eny Iay he light was and Ialyf
So was hir͗e Ioly whistel wel I wette
Þe cradel at hir beddes feete was sette
To rokken and to ȝeue þe child to souke
And whan þat dronken was al in þe crouke
To bed went þe doughter right a non
